oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup - 1946-12-19 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program, staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), Kenyon Brown (producer). Performances feature Chuck Davis (performer), the Homegrown Trio (performers), Hiram Higsby (performer), Mary Lou (performer), and Dick Reinhart (performer) on December 19, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Homegrown Trio; Mary Lou; Ann Bond; Hiram Higsby; Dick Reinhart
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Hiram Higsby tells a joke to Allan Page / (0:30) Opening theme and opening statements / (1:43) Hiram Higsby talks / (2:03) Chuck Davis performs "Let A Smile Be Your Umbrella" / (3:30) Allan Page and Hiram Higsby tell a joke / (3:50) Cimarron Kids performs "Ridin’" / (5:38) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (6:05) Hiram Higsby performs "Etiquette Blues" / (8:30) Hiram Higsby introduces Mary Lou / (8:41) Mary Lou performs "Trail Herdin’ Cowboy" / (10:56) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (11:15) Dick Reinhart performs "You’re The Sweetest Rose In Texas" / (14:08) Closing statements and theme [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Bond, Ann; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Reinhart, Dick;
